meanings.definition: The quality or state of being cruel.
meanings.sent1: Her cruelnesses towards animals were heartbreaking.
meanings.sent2: The cruelnesses of the dictator were well-known.
meanings.sent3: Despite her cruelnesses, she had a soft spot for stray cats.
meanings.sent4: The cruelnesses of war can scar a person for life.
meanings.sent5: The dark cloud of his cruelnesses hung over the village.

meanings.sent1: The cruelnesses inflicted on the innocent were unforgivable.
meanings.sent2: Witnessing such cruelnesses made her question humanity.
meanings.sent3: The cruelnesses of the prank were all in good fun.
meanings.sent4: The cruelnesses of nature can be harsh but necessary.
meanings.sent5: The cruelnesses of the bully left lasting scars on the victims.
